ing toward him. The foremost, wearing a Cos- sack cloak and lambskin cap and riding a white horse, was Prince Bagrati6n. Prince An- drew stopped, waiting for him to come up; Prince Bagrati6n reined in his horse and recog- nizing Prince Andrew nodded to him. He still looked ahead while Prince Andrew told him what he had seen.
